name: chicago-badge-studio
description: Badge image creation tool for Chicago Summer of Learning.

scripts.start: node_modules/.bin/r.js -o mainConfigFile=js/require-config.js baseUrl=js paths.requireLib=../vendor/require include=requireLib,filepicker.io name=studio out=js/studio.min.js

author: Atul Varma <varmaa@gmail.com>
